Questions.q_healthy: Are you healthy and in good fitness? Are there any health restrictions, handicaps or serious allergies?
Questions.q_medication: Do you take any medication? If yes, which ones?
Questions.q_condition: Have you ever been in exceptional psychological condition?
Questions.q_biography: In your biography, are there any particularly stressful life events? Are there any psychological traumas? Please state them briefly.
Questions.q_treatment: Are you / have you ever been in psychiatric / psychotherapeutic treatment?
Questions.q_substances: Is there any substance use for stabilisation in situations of crisis? If yes, which substances?

Personal environment.q_crisis: Is there currently a crisis in your life ( i.e. break-up with your partner, loss of job, loss of a beloved person, illness of a close person?)
Personal environment.q_support: Do you have a support network â€“ family, friends, a partner, who are there for you if you need them?
Personal environment.q_stress: How do you react in stress situations?
Personal environment.q_helpful: Which aspects of your personality are helpful in these situations? Which are not so helpful?
Personal environment.q_dislike: Which personality aspects of others typically drive you nuts?
Personal environment.q_death: What is your experience with death and suffering? Have you ever seen a dead body? How would you react if you could not help in an emergency situation?
Personal environment.q_concern: What is your greatest concern about the mission?
